execution_quality: Partial execution with misalignment on signing scope. Agent signed all commits when user only wanted their own commits signed, requiring a follow-up correction.
work_category: Git repository maintenance task involving branch renaming, commit signing, and reordering commits to resolve dependency issues with another PR.
summary: Agent attempted a three-part git task (branch rename, commit signing, reordering) but misinterpreted the signing requirement as applying to all commits rather than just 'ours'. The user's immediate clarification indicates the core approach was reasonable but execution missed a key constraint. Significant iteration will be needed to complete the task correctly.
follow_up_pattern: User provided clarification on signing scope, implying agent misunderstood the original request. Expected pattern: agent revises approach to sign only specific commits.
